meico.mpm

Class Mpm

  • java.lang.Object
    • meico.xml.XmlBase
      • meico.msm.AbstractMsm
        • meico.mpm.Mpm

  • public class Mpm
extends AbstractMsm
    This class holds data in mpm format (Music Performance Markup).
    Author:
    Axel Berndt.

      • createMpm

        public static Mpm createMpm()
        An Mpm factory. Be aware that this is not a valid MPM document until a first Performance has been added!
        Returns:

        private void parseData()
        this parses the xml data and generates Performance objects from it that go into the performances ArrayList

        public int size()
        get the number of performances in this mpm

      • getPerformance

        public Performance getPerformance(java.lang.String name)
        Get a performance by name. If the mpm holds more than one performance with this name, this method will return only the first. Use getAllPerformances() to access all performances and find the right one.
        Parameters:
        name -
        Returns:
        the performance or null if there is no performance with this name

      • getPerformance

        public Performance getPerformance(int i)
        access a performance by index
        Parameters:
        i -
        Returns:

      • getAllPerformances

        public java.util.ArrayList<Performance> getAllPerformances()
        this returns all performances in this mpm as an ArrayList
        Returns:

      • addPerformance

        public boolean addPerformance(Performance performance)
        add a performance to this mpm, but caution: if another performance with the same name exists already in this mpm, accessing it via getPerformance(name) will return only the first in the list
        Parameters:
        performance -
        Returns:
        success

      • addPerformance

        public Performance addPerformance(java.lang.String name)
        generate a performance and add it to this mpm, but caution: if another performance with the same name exists already in this mpm, accessing it via getPerformance(name) will return only the first in the list
        Parameters:
        name -
        Returns:

        public void removePerformance(java.lang.String name)

      • removePerformance

        public void removePerformance(Performance performance)
        remove the specified performance from this mpm
        Parameters:
        performance -

      • writeMpm

        public boolean writeMpm()
        writes the mpm document to an mpm file at this.file (it must be != null); if there is already an msm file with this name, it is replaces!
        Returns:
        true if success, false if an error occured

      • writeMpm

        public boolean writeMpm(java.lang.String filename)
        writes the mpm document to a file (filename should include the path and the extension .mpm)
        Parameters:
        filename - the filename string; it should include the path and the extension .mpm
        Returns:
        true if success, false if an error occured
